Sent:06/27/2024 at 02:37 PM

Subject:Re: OFW
Message 3358 of 4024
I got word that you said that Adrain said I had been drinking before seeing him on Monday. I am proud of him for speaking up if that is true.
What would help me to co-parent better would be if you told me how the conversation happened and how you handled that situation with him.
I just sent you my photo getting my Vivitrol shot. You knew I could not show signs of drinking. So did you explain that was medically impossible?
I think it will serve everyone well to be able to debunk things that we know could not be medically true. He would likely feel better too.
